entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
